snippet.title: First 30 Minutes: Lego Island [PC]
snippet.description:
Buy this game (Amazon): http://amzn.to/XZk7d8

First 30 minutes of gameplay from the action adventure game Lego Island

My first 30 minute videos are a series of videos that feature the first 30 minutes of unedited gameplay from new and old video games 

DISCLAIMER: This video is intended for educational purposes on how to play the game 

Recorded on the PC version 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/#!/first30mins

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/firstthirtyminutes

Ever wondered how I record PC gameplay? Watch this: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v5QXrSsBw8g
